instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 no WIFI but have Bluetooth i change card but no luck
threads.message:
i change card but no luck
PP3V3_S3   3.2V
R3451 PIN 2 = 3.2V
Q3450 PINS 1-4 =3.2V
PINS 5-8 = 0V

threads.title: 820-2936 no WIFI but have Bluetooth i change card but no luck
threads.message:
Did you change the flex too?
Post U3440 voltages.

threads.title: 820-2936 no WIFI but have Bluetooth i change card but no luck
threads.message:
yes i change cable
u3440 pin 1 pp3v3_s3 = 3.2v
pin 2 = 0
pin3 ap_reset_l = 3.3
pin 4 = 0
pin 6 ap_pwr_en = 3.2v
everthing else = 0

threads.title: 820-2936 no WIFI but have Bluetooth i change card but no luck
threads.message:
Post Q7920/25 voltages.
Inspect that area for corrosion.

threads.title: 820-2936 no WIFI but have Bluetooth i change card but no luck
threads.message: thanks Q7925 had some broken traces
